name: Giant Toad Dungeon Adventure
description:
English:

You're playing as a toad, the main goal in this demo is to get 20 coins, in order to achieve that you'll need to swallow the rats and spit them to destroy the other enemies.

Spanish:

En esta demo jugaras como un sapo, el objetivo principal es recolectar 20 monedas, para conseguir eso necesitara tragar las ratas y dispararselas a otros enemigos. 

Feedback (Spanish): https://goo.gl/forms/Hxa4HvV2nSruaH7J3
